title: Highlight theme
description: A theme for the Highlight syntax highlighter

color.description: The text color of the syntax type

font_weight.description: The font weight for the syntax type. This should be a number between 1 and 1000

font_style.description: The font style for the syntax type

background_color.description: The background color for the syntax type

bg.description: The default background color. This is the background color of the code block

fg.description: The default text color. This is set on the parent `<pre>` element and is used if no valid highlight is present, or no highlight color is provided for that syntax.

line_numbers.description: An object to configure line numbers. If this is left out, no line numbers will be present

color.description: The color of the line numbers

right_space.description: The number of spaces between the line numbers and the code, in units of `ch`

highlights.description: An object to configure highlights. This is a map, with the keys being the syntax types, and the values being the configuration object. If you don't want to have inline styles, you can have the keys be the syntax types you want to select, and the configuration object empty for each one.
